description:
When Fuyuki puts on a special jersey from Keron, he becomes Jerseyman, a globetrotting superhero with a special interest in cryptids. Then, the Keroro Platoon and the Hinata family all inadvertently suck on cough drops that cause them to spout weird little phrases at the end of each sentence. What`s even weirder is that they seem to enjoy it!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fuyuki, Birth! Jerseyman Fuyuki / Keroro, the Great Throat Candies
冬樹 誕生!ジャージマン冬樹 であります / ケロロ 素敵なのど飴 でありまちんぴょろ
